original_text:
As a father shows compassion to his children,
    so the Lord shows compassion to those who fear him.
korean_text: 아버지가 자식을 긍휼히 여김 같이 여호와께서는 자기를 경외하는 자를 긍휼히 여기시나니

sentences.original_text: As a father shows compassion to his children,
sentences.korean_translation: 아버지가 자기 자식을 긍휼히 여기는 것처럼,
